Drussuvissill was a hin farmer, displaced by The Absolute, and as a refugee, sought shelter in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Drussuvissill was an irate, rosy-faced halfling woman with short-cut black hair and black eyes. She wore the simplest commoners clothes and a raggedy leather skullcap.
In the , an army assembled by the Cult of the Absolute moved from the Moonrise Towers in the Chionthar Valley to menace the city of Baldurs Gate, displacing countless refugees in the process along the way. Drussuvissill fled to the nearby city of Baldurs Gate with her farm animals. However, all of hers and many other farmers beasts were confiscated by the Flaming Fist mercenaries upon entry to fight famine in the city. Drussuvissill was infuriated by Lord Gortashs decree and raged over the confiscated animals not being fair. Despite being robbed of her livelihood, Drussuvissill was granted entrance to the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, where she was protesting among other farmers near the Basilisk Gate.
